long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
üì± Social Media Side Panel - Facebook, Twitter, Instagram & WhatsApp

Access your favorite social media platforms directly from Chrome's side panel! Stay connected while browsing without switching tabs.

‚ú® Key Features:
- Quick access to all major social media platforms
- Easy switching between accounts
- Clean and intuitive interface
- Platform-specific color themes
- Save browser space with side panel view

üåê Supported Platforms:
- Facebook
- Twitter (X)
- Instagram
- WhatsApp Web

üí° How it works:
Simply click the extension icon to open the side panel, then select your desired social media platform. Log in once, and your session will be saved for future use.

üîí Privacy & Security:
- No data collection
- No tracking
- Secure login through official platforms
- Requires minimal permissions

Perfect for:
- Social media multitasking
- Community managers
- Digital marketers
- Anyone who uses multiple social platforms

Get instant access to all your social media accounts while browsing the web!
